Key Features of Mox Saving Account
Enjoy Daily Interest
Earn 0.3% per annum daily interest rate on your Hong Kong Dollar (HKD) savings for up to HK$ 500,000 with Mox. Moreover, you can earn 0.01% per annum daily interest on all foreign currency deposits in your Mox Account.
Time deposits made flexible with no early withdrawal fees
Mox offers flexible ways for clients to save. You can earn preferential interest rates and yet enjoy the flexibility of a savings account as Mox won’t charge any early withdrawal fees.
Goal saving
Mox allows you to organize your HKD savings by setting up up to 5 Goal accounts, keeping your current and saving account entirely separate. In this way, you can name them accordingly and track your progress in real time, making sure you are on track to realize all the Goals.
Saving habit
You can make use of Mox Savings Calculator for budgeting and automating your saving habit. Also, you can set rules to transfer money into your Goals on a regular basis.
Mox Deposit Protection
Mox is a member of the Deposit Protection Scheme in Hong Kong. In this way, your eligible deposits with Mox (no matter what currency it is) are protected by the Deposit Protection Scheme. Each depositor can enjoy up to a limit of HK$500,000 (or its equivalent).
Frequently Asked Questions
How much interest can I earn on my savings account with Mox?
HKD: enjoy daily interest at a rate of 0.3% per annum for a maximum of HK$500,000. Foreign currency deposits: enjoy daily interest at a rate of 0.1% per annum.
How often is interest on my savings paid into my Mox account?
Mox gives interest daily to your account, including weekends and public holidays.
What currencies can I open a savings account with at Mox?
Currently, Mox offers saving accounts in Australian Dollar (AUD), Canadian Dollar (CAD), Euro (EUR), British Pound (GBP), Japanese Yen (JPY), New Zealand Dollar (NZD), Singapore Dollar (SGD), and United States Dollar (USD).
